author: gartung
body:
Tested on PhysicsTools/PatAlgos which makes use of both. Examples of test output to console:
```
In file included from /build/gartung/CMSSW_12_2_X_2021-11-29-2300/src/PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/plugins/VertexAssociationProducer.cc:23:
/build/gartung/CMSSW_12_2_X_2021-11-29-2300/src/PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/interface/VertexingHelper.h:35:13: warning: deprecated function edm::ParameterSet::existsAs<double>(const std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > &, _Bool) const is called in function reco::modules::ParameterAdapter<pat::VertexAssociationSelector>::make(const edm::ParameterSet &) [deprecated.psetExistsChecker]
        if (iConfig.existsAs<double>("deltaZ"))
            ^       ~~~~~~~~
/build/gartung/CMSSW_12_2_X_2021-11-29-2300/src/PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/plugins/PATTriggerProducer.cc:219:7: warning: deprecated function edm::ParameterSet::exists(const std::basic_string<char, std::char_traits<char>, std::allocator<char> > &) const is called in function pat::PATTriggerProducer::PATTriggerProducer(const edm::ParameterSet &) [deprecated.psetExistsChecker]
  if (iConfig.exists("addL1Algos"))
      ^       ~~~~~~
```
title: Static Analyzers: Add checker for use of edm::ParameterSet::exists or ::existsAs<T>.
